nodes.text: Ronald D. Moore is a television screenwriter who wrote several scripts for Star Wars: Underworld. He is known for his work on the Star Trek franchise, the Battlestar Galactica reboot series, and For All Mankind. In February 2021, it was announced that he had signed an exclusivity deal to work for Disney's television division. In an interview with The Hollywood Reporter, he expressed interest in again working on a Star Wars project.
